message: I've got a 14 hour plane ride (each way) to Australia coming up later this week and I'm planning on using it to start watching a new show or two.  Favorite shows currently are Dexter, Breaking Bad, The League, Big Bang Theory, How I Met Your Mother, the UK Skins and general premium shows like Entourage, Weeds, True Blood, etc.  What else should I be watching?
Sports Night is brilliant, and funny (it's more about the production of a TV show than sports). I will caution you that the laugh-track is a bit jarring in the first few episodes.
I second that. That or Studio 60 if you missed it
You have to watch Psych and Scrubs. My favorite two shows hands down
